Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (128.0.6613.120) detected in PATH at C:\webdrivers\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (129.0.6668.90); currently, chromedriver 129.0.6668.89 is recommended for chrome 129.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: จำนวนที่กดปุ่มยกเลิกสินค้า: ${Count_Clicked} จำนวนสินค้าในตะกร้า: ${New_Cart_Count_Text}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: จำนวนสินค้าในตะกร้า: ${Count_Clicked}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.doc: กรณี ยกเลิกสินค้า

kw.name: ออกจากระบบ และ ปิดเบราว์เซอร์
ออกจากระบบ
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: ปิดเบราว์เซอร์
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (128.0.6613.120) detected in PATH at C:\webdrivers\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (129.0.6668.90); currently, chromedriver 129.0.6668.89 is recommended for chrome 129.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
